body: Raised in the church (whether or not you are currently a follower), you've focused your indoctrinated fervor primarily on the elimination of demons. You gain a +3 trait bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks about demons and a +2 trait bonus on Will saves against mind-affecting spells and effects from demons.
name: Demon Hunter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Religion Traits/Demon Hunter
